name: Schedule Trigger
description: Trigger workflow on a schedule using cron expressions or intervals

name: Webhook
description: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called

name: HTTP Request
description: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data

name: Set
description: Sets values on items and optionally removes other values

name: IF
description: Splits a workflow conditionally based on comparison operations

name: Code
description: Run custom JavaScript or Python code

actions.name: jsCode

name: Send Email
description: Sends an email using SMTP protocol

name: Slack
description: Send messages, create channels, and manage Slack workspace

options.name: Post
options.description: Posts a message to a channel

options.name: Reply
options.description: Replies to a message in a thread

triggers.name: watchedChannels
triggers.description: Channels to watch. Choose from the list or specify by ID.

name: Google Sheets
description: Read, write, and manage Google Sheets spreadsheets

actions.name: documentId
actions.description: The Google Sheets Document to use. Choose from the list, or specify by ID.

name: Mailchimp
description: Add this node to your workflow

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new member on list

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many members on a list

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a new member on list

options.name: Create
options.description: Add tags from a list member

options.name: Delete
options.description: Remove tags from a list member

actions.name: list
actions.description: List of lists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

actions.name: returnAll
actions.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

triggers.name: list
triggers.description: The list that is gonna fire the event.

name: Merge
description: Merges data of multiple streams once data from both is available

options.name: Append
options.description: All items of input 1, then all items of input 2

options.name: Combine
options.description: Combine items based on a field or position

options.name: Choose Branch
options.description: Output items of a specific branch

name: Split In Batches
description: Split data into batches and process each batch

actions.name: batchSize
actions.description: The number of items to include in each batch

name: Wait
description: Wait before continuing with execution or resume on webhook call

name: Postgres
description: Get, add and update data in Postgres
